system.powerDescription:
You can briefly reverse time in order to alter causality for any event that happened as a result of an action roll made by you or an ally in {<CAT> range 0}, instantly after you see the result. Re-roll the action roll completely, taking the second result as final. 
        
When you use this power, gain temporal instability. If you use it again before you rest, gain 1d3 temporal instability instead.
